name: Gabriel deGrood Bendt
description:
GdB is a Minneapolis-based marketing services agency, offering expertise in brand strategy and communications – including advertising, interactive, social media, PR and stuff that hasn't been invented yet.  Unlike traditional agency models, GdB operates free of departments and hierarchies.
 Specialties ranging from interactive to media to creative services work closely together to deliver on the company’s trademarked “always-thinking” credo:  to consistently deliver simple, powerful, difference-making ideas.
READ MORE...
